#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>

long a,q,b,t,br,z,y;

int main() {
 scanf("%d", &t);
 for (long k=1; k<=t; k++) {
  br=0;
  y=0;
  b=0;
  scanf("%d", &a);
  while (y==0) {
   q=a;
   b=0;
   while (q>0) {
    b=b*10+q%10;
    q=q/10;
    }
   if (a==b) {
    printf("%d %d\n", br, a);
    break;
    }
    else  {
     br++;
     a=a+b;
     }
   }
  }
 return 0;
}
